resources.string: Reflex Reactor is a fastest finger first quiz. You have to quickly tap the options in correct order to get more points.\n

Level 1: Time limit is 30 sec.
Level 2: Time limit is 20 sec. 
Level 3: Time limit is 15 sec.
Level 4: Time limit is 10 sec.

We have 12 categories.

1. MISC: Questions of different kinds-synonyms, calculations and more. 

2. GENERAL KNOWLEDGE: Questions of general intelligence.

 3. CRICKET: Questions entirely based on cricket.

4. GEOGRAPHY: Questions related to different places.

5. Mythology: Questions related to hindu mythologies like Mahabharata.

6. History: Questions related to historical events.

7. INDIAN CULTURE: Questions about Indian culture.

8. POLITICS: Questions related to political activities.

9.SCIENCE: Contains simple science questions.

10. SPORTS: Questions related to different international sports.

11. TV AND MOVIES: Questions related to different Tv series and movies.

12. ECONOMICS: Questions related to economics.

1. You must press SUBMIT button to finalise your answer. After pressing submit, you cannot change your answer.

 2. You can reset your answer using RESET button. It will allow you to retap your answer.

 3. Scoring is based on degree of correctness of answer as well as response time. If only two options are in correct order then you will get negative marks!

 4. If you won a match you will be given 10 gems!

 5. If you lose a match 5 gems will be deducted!
